name: atm-system
description: 1. The ATM system should support basic operations such as balance inquiry, cash withdrawal, and cash deposit. 2. Users should be able to authenticate themselves using a card and a PIN (Personal Identification Number). 3. The system should interact with a bank's backend system to validate user accounts and perform transactions. 4. The ATM should have a cash dispenser to dispense cash to users. 5. The system should handle concurrent access and ensure data consistency. 6. The ATM should have a user-friendly interface for users to interact with.
